articles.content: Even with decades of unprecedented development in computational power, the human brain still holds many advantages over modern computing technologies. Our brains are extremely efficient for many cogn… [+4066 chars]

articles.title: Scientists identify coronavirus COVID-19 virus `hidden` new gene - Zee News
articles.description: Researchers have identified a new  hidden  gene in SARS-CoV-2, the virus responsible for Covid-19, that may have contributed to its unique biology and pandemic potential.
articles.content:
New York: Researchers have identified a new "hidden" gene in SARS-CoV-2, the virus responsible for Covid-19, that may have contributed to its unique biology and pandemic potential.

articles.author: Technology Networks
articles.title: Heart Organoids Mimic the Early Stages of Embryonic Heart Development - Technology Networks
articles.description: Bioengineers at EPFL have used organoids to mimic the early development of the heart in the mouse embryo. The work is another step towards future bioartificial organs for research and transplants.
articles.content: There was a time when the idea of growing organs in the lab was the stuff of science fiction. Today, stem cell biology and tissue engineering are turning fiction into reality with the advent of organ… [+3512 chars]
